name: Taking The Cake
description:
Mr. Super Fabulous needs your help to get through the bunker and give the Bad Guys their Just Desserts. Avoid enemies, becoming flambé, and other unpleasant obstacles to reach your goal and save the day. If that doesn't take the cake, i don't know what does.

Controls

A=Left

D=Right

Space=Jump

Shift=Sprint

E=Open doors

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam 108.
